hero.title: Smart Box IoT
hero.description: Smart Box IoT is an intelligent monitoring system that maintains the temperature, humidity, and location of food supplies. Designed to support the Free Nutritious Meal Program, ensuring food quality during transport.

monitoring.title: Monitoring System
monitoring.desc: Monitors food temperature and humidity in real time to maintain quality during distribution.

connected.title: Connected and Efficient
connected.desc: Integrated with GPS and web dashboard for efficient and secure monitoring.

responsive.title: Responsive and Secure
responsive.desc: Sends automatic alerts when temperature or humidity exceed safe thresholds.

nutrition.title: How Smart Box IoT Improves Food Distribution and Storage

quality.title: Maintains Food Quality
quality.desc: Ensures food remains fresh and safe during storage and transportation.

safety.title: Reduces Risk of Damage
safety.desc: Provides early warnings for unsafe storage conditions.

efficiency.title: Enhances Delivery Efficiency
efficiency.desc: Tracks delivery routes in real time for better logistics management.
